snippet.title: Aruna's Adventure Trailer
snippet.description:
Aruna's Adventure is set to launch on September 23rd on iOS.

Take a trip back to the early '90s for this retro action adventure for iOS.
Take control of the blue haired heroine Aruna, who is trying to stop the Dark Lord from infesting the lands with monsters.
Explore multiple landscapes, discover secrets, find new gear, and fight monsters with powerful weapons.
Enter dungeons, search for keys, fight bosses, and get your rewards.

Enjoy the nostalgia, but still enjoy some modern conveniences
- Autosave: Never lose progress when closing the app.
- Cloud syncing: Continue your game on another device.
- Full Controller support: in-game and menus.
- Gamecenter achievements.
- 120fps on supported devices.
